Description: Location based check-in mobile game
Full Description: (h)OURspot reinvents the location check-in feature into a game of territory takeover in any city! Users can play private games with just their friends or team up and play a large scale public game to compete for bragging rights and prizes!  Imagine your hometown split up into dozens of territories.  Check-in to places to conquer them as well as territories you already own to defend them.  Keep in mind that check-ins are limited by time, so talk to your teammates and play strategically!  The team with the most check-ins in a territory owns that "spot" and the team that owns the most "spots" when the time elapses, wins!

Unless it's a huge news day, we deliver only one or two new stories per day, instead of cluttering your mind with filler. "My generation is bombarded with vast amounts of information, and it get's to a point when it's useless to pay attention to any of it. Description: We make interactive Apps & books for kids through these we bring the sights, sounds & diversity of India to children all over the world.
Full Description: At 3 Curious Monkeys, we introduce children to the diversity, sights, sounds, colours, traditions and the wonders of India via books and digital Apps. The stories revolve around the many adventures of three curious monkeys -Suno, Dekho, Jaano- who take the little ones on whirlwind escapades that revolve around various aspects of India. All of this is accompanied by plenty of action, interaction and reactions played out in a modern and fun manner. We offer: Proficiency- Our books ( print or digital) help in the development of early language skills for the very young and early readers. Our apps are easy to play with and require little or no assistance, fostering a sense of accomplishment. Culture- We offer beautiful and original artwork, animations and sounds that introduces children to the splendour and diversity of India. Our content is written in a way that kids can understand and relate to it. Security- Our products are mommy approved and are non-violent, use appropriate language and do not contain any third party ads and in-app purchases. Fun- Our cute and engaging characters make our products fun for kids while teaching them valuable lessons. Meant to start a conversation between children and parents the 3 Curious Monkeys brings traditions to life with characters that will have your children excited to see, hear and learn more! Who we are When two US-based mompreneurs- Shweta Chopra and Shuchi Mehta- began looking for contemporary and fun stories, about India, that they could share with their children they hit against a road-block. This lacunae encouraged the duo to start 3 Curious Monkeys, a venture that would make Indian culture more accessible, relevant and relatable for young children.

Description: 704Games is a video game publisher and developer focused on delivering high-quality experiences on console and mobile.
Full Description: 704Games, formerly Dusenberry Martin Racing, was founded in January 2015 when they  acquired the NASCAR video game license. From the start, they  began the monumental goal of rebooting the NASCAR video game franchise. They first turned to Monster Games who developed NASCAR Heat and its sequel, NASCAR Dirt to Daytona. The team at Monster Games was excited to get back to NASCAR, and work began from ground zero on the first NASCAR video game on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Over the next few months, the talent at 704Games grew exponentially with game industry veterans joining their team to focus exclusively on the mission to rebuild the NASCAR video game franchise. NASCAR Heat Evolution was announced in May 2016 at the Sprint All-Star Race in Charlotte, NC. Carl Edwards raced his way onto the cover, a first for the driver and also a first for Toyota. After months of excitement, NASCAR Heat Evolution was officially released on September 13, 2016.  The team assembled has worked on all of the best NASCAR games in history. Their goal is to rebuild the NASCAR video game experience back to what it should be with fun, engaging, and competitive racing that captures the lifestyle and excitement that NASCAR brings to the track each and every week. NASCAR Heat Evolution was just the beginning. They wanted to deliver a solid foundation that they knew theycould continue to expand upon for years to come. At 704Games, they feel very confident they have achieved that goal and are excited about their  much-anticipated sequel that will be released in fall 2017. In addition to their console games, 704Games is focused on reaching mobile gamers as well. NASCAR Heat Mobile launched in April of 2017. This new, exciting iOS and Android game will place 40 NASCAR stock cars on the track together for the first time on mobile devices. It will also introduce a world-building component for fans to create the ultimate NASCAR empire. ​ As we look toward the future at 704Games, we’re focused on NASCAR and looking at new and emerging opportunities outside of the sport. Subscribe below for the latest news and announcements.

Description: 72photos is a photo management and sharing service allowing users to upload, edit, share and backup their photos online.
Full Description: 72photos is an innovative photo management and sharing service that allows users to upload, edit, share and backup their photos online. No fee is required to use 72photos and pro accounts are available to users that can provide them with additional space and bandwidth for a small yearly fee. Every user on 72photos has a personal online profile showcasing photos and galleries from their 72photos account. Users have the option to set extensive permissions on their profile, photos and galleries to control exactly what others can see. 72photos also features an in-suite set of photo manipulation and editing tools that allow users to complete tasks such as: red-eye removal, cropping, rotating, black/white, sepia and much more. In addition to editing tools, all user photos are versioned, which allows them to revert back to the original at any time. Other features of 72photos include advanced organizational tools such as real-time searching, tagging, and filtering photos by the camera that was used to take them. Sharing options are also provided to allow users to post their photos directly to Facebook, Myspace and other social networking sites as well as embeddable widgets for use on their personal blog or website.

Description: Acciyo uses machine learning to provide automatic context on any news article.

Description: Ad Fontes Media is a Public Benefit Corporation that rates the news. It was founded by Vanessa Otero, creator of the Media Bias Chart®.
Full Description: Ad Fontes Media, Inc. is a company founded in 2018 by Vanessa Otero, creator of the Media Bias Chart®. The mission of Ad Fontes Media is “to make news consumers smarter and news media better.” Ad Fontes rates the news for reliability and bias to help people navigate the news landscape. Ad Fontes is Latin for “to the source,” because at the heart of what Ad Fontes Media does is look at the source—analyze the very content itself—to rate it. Ad Fontes has created a system of news content ratings that has beneficial applications for all stakeholders in a healthy news media landscape, including consumers, educators, journalism outlets, researchers, advertisers, and social media platforms. Ad Fontes currently creates ratings with a small team of human analysts who have political views from across the spectrum. The analysts are trained to look at the content of the news and score it according to a consistent methodology. Ad Fontes provides the news source ratings themselves as a reference product for consumers and educators—mainly through through its widely known Media Bias Chart. Ad Fontes also now offers a software platform for educators to teach students how to rate the news using its approach. Ad Fontes Media is incorporated as a Public Benefit Corporation (PBC) in Colorado. The stated public benefit of Ad Fontes Media is the same as its mission. It is currently funded by its founder, by a crowdfunding campaign which ran in late 2018,  by sales of licenses, prints, data products, and educational products, and by donations (non-tax-deductible) by individuals who believe in its mission.

The aerial camera makes even more people engaged in these social communications by let them share photos taken in a brand new way and this was something not possible since now with the existing devices.  The expert know-how in AI and software development of AirSelfie is constantly working on the evolution of new pocket devices that could satisfy all the user needs. An in depth analysis of cognitive algorithms and their applications in specific activities is already providing unique and important results to extend and widen the actual supply on the market and present brand new branch lines.  AirSelfie’s team of world experts in engineering and design is now working together with the “Enterprises Factory” e-Novia to do an intensive product research and is exploiting the distinctive e-Novia’s skills in Predictive Control, sensing, reasoning, acting and Artificial Perception to realize new functions and features of the AirSelfie cameras and explore new interaction and opportunities in the consumer electronics sector. AirSelfie - the product and its accessories - has been designed by an international team of talent hailing from all over the world. Developers and engineers from Shanghai, Italian designers, experienced corporate leaders all coordinated by the AirSelfie Holdings Group, which through its affiliates, manages development, production and distribution globally.

Description: Anvato is a video software platform that creates multiple adaptive bitrate streams for uninterrupted playback on any device or website.
Full Description: Anvato, Inc. is a technology platform for media companies to manage and monetize live and on demand video assets.  Anvato serves both publishers and advertisers providing the only end-to-end media content platform with live and on-demand video management, syndication, monetization, and analytics. Anvato's unique technology enables broadcasters to capture live broadcasts, edit live and syndicate to web and mobile devices near real time. Publishers can monetize live streams with dynamic and user-targeted ad insertion. Anvato allows advertisers to track campaign effectiveness and optimize ad revenue. US Media clients include Univision Communications, and Kantar Video, a division of WPP.  Anvato is the recipient of the 2010 Frost and Sullivan Global Innovation Award in Online Video. The company is headquartered in Mountain View, CA.

Industries: Hardware, Internet, Software, Video Streaming
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Hardware, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Description: AnySource Media enables consumer electronics manufacturers to bring a wide range of internet-delivered video directly into their devices.
Full Description: Founded in 2006, AnySource Media is a rapidly-growing, innovative technology company enabling consumer electronics manufacturers to bring a wide range of Internet-delivered video directly into their devices. AnySource Media provides an Internet-enabled TV (iTV) platform, called the Internet Video Navigator™ (IVN) to silicon companies and consumer electronics manufacturers of HDTV worldwide. The IVN platform includes embedded software inside the HDTV, a full-spectrum of both branded and user-generated video content delivered over a direct Internet connection, as well as a targeted advertising and user management system managed at the IVN data center. Similar to a video RSS reader for television, the IVN data center communicates with a wide-range of content providers to collect the information necessary to populate the friendly IVN user interface on the HDTV screen. The content description data is enhanced and normalized so the navigation experience is simple and consistent. The navigation data is then delivered to the TV along with advertising, preferences and other transaction information.

Full Description: In Dec 2020, after going through the Techstars Music Accelerator, we saw how our robot DJ could be a painkiller for new artists by providing exposure for their music. Thanks to developing technologies, good music is getting easier and easier to make. But today, 90% of music streams come from less than 0.2% of artists. We pivoted the company from an interactive music game for bars to an audio-visual music platform that lets curators earn money by building robot DJs from their playlists of new artist music. Industries: Audio, Film, Music, Software, Video Editing
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio, Software, Video
Description: SaaS
Full Description: National Association of Broadcasters 2020 Best of Show Award Winner 2020 SXSW Innovation Awards Finalist 2020 Startupfest $100K Prize Top Tier 2020 SaaS Awards Shortlist Audio Design Desk is an AI-Assisted content creation tool that reinvents the process of connecting audio to video, turning hours of frustrating work into minutes of inspired fun. It is an entirely new breed of Digital Audio Workstation that artists can play like an instrument, revolutionizing how sound for video is produced, refined and delivered. Our powerful AI engine notices users’ likes and dislikes, so over time, Audio Design Desk gets to know each user’s taste. It comes bundled with over 20,000 sounds embedded with patent-pending Sonic Intelligence™, which makes our groundbreaking technology possible. Audio Design Desk’s intuitive and innovative content creation tools empower filmmakers, sound designers, composers, and creators to produce cinema-quality compositions at the speed of thought, giving them a level of creative control that is unmatched by any other software. Here’s how it works: Every sound in the add.app library is assigned identifying characteristics and carries an embedded sync point, which means that as sounds are previewed and chosen, they automatically land on the timeline in the exact right position relative to the video. The user simply imports a video file into the app and presses keys on their keyboard—H for hits, R for rises, D for drones, or users can assign sets of sounds to their numeric keys. The user can then strike the keys to position sound elements in real-time while watching the video playback—in effect, using the QWERTY keyboard like a Smart Sampler. For users who would rather select audio manually, add.app can search, audition and place sounds right from the timeline, completely eliminating the need to parse through libraries, import sounds and then find where they sync. Once a composition is set, add.app understands where sound connects to video and, by adjusting replacement criteria such as intensity, complexity, genre or feel, Audio Design Desk can use its Sonic Intelligence™ to instantly turn a single composition into infinite alternates without losing sync. Perhaps the most mind-blowing of all, add.app uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) and has built the foundation for Machine Learning (ML) to understand which sounds a user likes and which sounds they reject so, over time, add.app will learn and adjust to its user’s taste.  add.app seamlessly integrates with the industry’s leading NLE software, including Adobe Premiere Pro, Apple Final Cut Pro, Apple Logic, DaVinci Resolve, Avid Pro Tools, and Avid Media Composer, with frame.io integration coming soon. add.app also works with hardware controllers like the Elgato Stream Deck, which makes the process of adding sound effects via keystrokes even easier.  Audio Design Desk is a SXSW Innovation Awards Finalist and winner of a 2020 NAB Show / Pro Sound News Best of Show Award. Already being used by editors at Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime Originals, add.app is fueling creativity everywhere. WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING Academy Award-nominated editor Matthew Cooke: “There isn't another piece of software that allows you to instantly create at this level of professionalism.” Sound Effects Editor of ZERO DARK THIRTY Jamie Hardt: “Audio Design Desk is the tool I’ve been looking for my entire career.” Mix Magazine: “Expertly designed,” “groundbreaking application that significantly speeds up the act of accurately adding sound effects and music to picture” ProAudioFiles: “A new paradigm for audio post production” Redshark News: “A breathtakingly effective idea for sound designers” Pro Video Coalition: “Represents an entirely new breed of Digital Audio Workstation—or DAW—that uses AI-assisted content creation tools to enable filmmakers, editors, sound designers and creators to produce cinema-quality sound in seconds"

Industries: EdTech, Education, Publishing
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Education, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Authorly is a digital publishing platform for creating storybook apps for Android, iOS, and Kindle Fire devices.
Full Description: Authorly is a digital publishing platform that enables anyone to create interactive, native storybook apps for Android, iOS, and Kindle Fire devices.   For authors today, creating digital versions of their books is both a costly and timely process. The options to create visually compelling, cross-platform storybooks requires either well-honed programming skills or the funding necessary to hire expensive developers to create these applications. Authorly founder Chris Whitman was one of these developers. After being hired by New York Times Bestselling author Carl Sams to convert the popular children's book Stranger in the Woods into an interactive app, he decided there must be an easier way. Whitman therefore began to build disruptive software that empowers authors to create their own apps. The result is Authorly: a platform perfect for children’s authors, comic book artists, visual novelists, or anyone with a great illustrated story to tell.  Authorly enables artists to create digital storybook applications through an intuitive web-based platform. Our proprietary technology takes care of the tedious aspects of app production, like adjusting each story to fit a multitude of smartphones and tablets and publishing them to iTunes, the Google Play, and the Amazon Appstore. Some of the features authors can add to their apps include basic animations, sound effects, embedded videos, automatically aligned word-by-word voice narration,  panning and zooming, and animated hotspot technology.

Description: Weather data, delivery & integration
Full Description: Baron Services, Inc., a leading weather technology company, specializes in location-based weather and provides state-of-the science weather information to enterprises, governments and broadcasters throughout the world.  Baron develops weather-related application program interfaces (APIs) for key industry sectors, including public safety, insurance, aviation, and transportation. With the Baron Weather API, customers receive accurate, web-delivered meteorological data streams for integration into a wide variety of devices and services, including smart phone/tablet apps, websites, multifunction displays (MFDs), chart plotters, and more.  From dangerous road conditions and storm tracking, to lightning, tornado, ice storm and hurricane alerts, to winds and temperatures aloft, customers get access to fresh, precision weather data that provides enhanced situational awareness.  Baron continues to develop new technology to bring pertinent weather information directly to where it is needed. Known industry-wide for advances in severe weather technology, Baron strives to make science simple for its partners and users. Baron’s accomplishments in developing weather-related APIs have led to partnerships with such respected industry names as Garmin, AvPlan, iFlightPlanner, Heads Up Technologies, Flight Radar 24, and SiriusXM. As the data provider for XMWX Satellite Weather, Baron delivers quality satellite data directly to the cockpit, helping pilots make the best decisions while in flight. As an organization Baron provides a wide selection of products ranging from client based software solutions, value added weather data both web and cloud delivered and manufacturers a complete line of Doppler Radar.  Company Achievements: Now a staple of television weather broadcasts, Baron Services was the first company to develop storm tracking technology and display it on-air. Other significant achievements include: •Revolutionized the auto industry with Road Condition and weather alerting technology, which brings weather information directly to dashboard displays via distribution over the XM Satellite networks.  •First to bring real-time weather to the cockpit through XMWX Satellite Weather for the general aviation market. XMWX also supports the marine industry.  •Experts in weather integration, data analysis and processing, forecast modeling, and radar manufacturing.  •The leading US manufacturer of Doppler radars and dual polarization technology.  •Designed and developed an upgrade of the nation’s system of 171 NWS Doppler radars to dual-polarization, in partnership with L-3 STRATIS.

Industries: Creative Agency, Developer Platform, Web Design
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Design, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Best Website Designers, Ecommerce Website Designer
Full Description: Web Developer 90 Canal Street, Boston, MA 02114 Mon- Fri 9 a.m. - 6 p.m. Cash, all cc You’re here because you need to know how to write an RFP for web design or redesign. An RFP is what agencies use to assess your project and then provide you with a proposal. At Big Drop, we receive tons of RFPs, ranging from small businesses to Fortune 500 companies–some are good, some are bad and some we no longer speak of. What we’ve laid out, is how to prepare an RFP for your website and how to create a great one. After all, the more thorough you can be with your RFP, the more accurate your proposal will be.   When you need a website, the first thing you do is put together a web redesign request for proposal. Submitting your RFP to multiple agencies is common and always a good idea — it’s how you get an idea of what it will really take to bring your project and vision to life. After you’ve submitted your request, agencies will respond with a proposed solution that outlines the scope of work, timeline, and cost for your website. Typically, this exchange is followed up by a brief phone call and a question and answer session. Think of your RFP as a first impression to potential agency partners. A great RFP sets the stage for a great partnership. A great RFP is clear, concise and gets straight to the point. You don’t have to have the technical know-how to create an RFP. In fact, most of the best RFPs we receive have no mention of code or technical jargon (we hear enough developer talk on a daily basis). If you know what integrations you want to use (MailChimp, HubSpot, Marketo) then list them in your RFP email to vendors. If not, forget it. You don’t have to have all of the answers. After all, that’s why you’re hiring an agency in the first place, so leave it to the pros to figure it out.

Description: Bitmovin is a young and dynamic multimedia company
Full Description: Bitmovin is a young and dynamic multimedia company. Their principal expertise is in the domain of information and communication technologies for audio-visual networks, in particular for HTTP streaming services and embedded multimedia applications. Additionally, bitmovin provides consulting and standardization services, specifically towards ISO/IEC MPEG. Bitmovin multimedia is a spin-of company of the Alpen-Adria-University Klagenfurt, where most of their experts come from, and the ALICANTE EU FP7-ICT project. Together with the University they are still investigated in all kinds of research in the field of multimedia and especially in state of the art standardization at this sector e.g. ISO/IEC MPEG. Their highly skilled and motivated employees work in their offices in the Lakeside Science & Technology Park, Building B01. Bitmovin offers API-based products to help developers solve the most complex video problems with cloud native software that runs anywhere. The company was founded in 2013 by Stefan Lederer, Christopher Müller and Christian Timmerer. Bitmovin is based in San Francisco, CA, USA and Klagenfurt, Austria and privately owned. The company's investors include Atomico, Dawn Capital, YCombinator (YC S15), SpeedInvest and Constantia Industries.

Description: Bitnami makes it easy to run your favorite web applications natively, virtually and in the cloud.
Full Description: Bitnami is a library of popular server applications and development environments that can be installed with one click, either in your laptop, in a virtual machine or hosted in the cloud. They take care of compiling and configuring the applications and all of their dependencies (third-party libraries, language runtimes, databases) so they work out-of-the-box. The resulting packaged software (a 'stack') is then made available as native installers, virtual machines and cloud images. These Bitnami application packages provide a consistent, secure and optimized end-user experience when deploying any app, on any platform. Bitnami-packaged applications are deployed over a million times per month and Bitnami drove over 235 million hours of compute usage in 2015. Bitnami is the leading supplier of applications to the major cloud marketplaces: Amazon, Google, Oracle, Microsoft and VMware, among others.

Industries: Apps, Photo Sharing, Photography, Social Media
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Bitzy offers an application that enables its users to share photos and texts with a selected group of people.
Full Description: Bitzy is the safe and easy way to share moments for a bit. Forget about the worry of consequences from a social network post. With Bitzy, you are able to set specific time limits for each text update and photo post. This limits the amount of time that your post is online for users to see. When the time limit you set has expired, the post will be deleted from your profile, the feed, and from our servers. Bitzy can be thought of as an interesting blend between Snapchat and Instagram, allowing you to send expiring posts to many followers at once. Bitzy allows you to see what's happening right now in people's lives. Honestly, do you really care that your friend went on a Caribbean cruise four years ago? Now you can see in real-time what your peeps are up to. Bitzy cleans up the old news once the time limit expires, keeping your feed more current and up-to-date. Your future boss does not need to know about that crazy night in Vegas (it happens) or who you voted for in the last election. Who wants to be reminded of those times shared with an ex? I mean, they're an ex for a reason, right? Bitzy's dynamic atmosphere changes as quickly as the events in your life. With Bitzy's impermanent feed, these unfortunate circumstances are MUCH less likely to occur. Bitzy provides a safe, mobile atmosphere where you can be yourself. Bitzy introduces a new way to control your privacy. Instead of having to determine whether all or none of your posts will be private, Bitzy allows you to control the privacy of each individual post. Posting a Public Bit allows everyone to see your post. Posting a private Bit allows only mutual followers to see your post. Mutual followers are users who follow you AND who you follow. This ensures your Bit is only viewable to those who you're most comfortable sharing with. We welcome your questions and feedback! Don't blink or you'll miss something! Bitzy is now available for free on the App Store.

Description: Early Warning Artificial Intelligence Platform surfacing manipulative disinformation campaigns, misinformation and propaganda.
Full Description: Blackbird is bringing Information Integrity to the digital media landscape. We help enterprise and national security organizations see the story behind the story for a more authentic information ecosystem. Blackbird.AI uses machine learning and interdisciplinary human intelligence to combat disinformation. Our proprietary AI-Driven SaaS platform is aimed at providing a more automated understanding of disinformation ( fake news )  campaigns and harmful digital media.  Blackbird’s Constellation Platform supports the objectives of understanding propaganda campaigns and automating mitigation and response efforts. Constellation can detect and highlight threat actors, entities of interest, accounts, (including bots/botnets and/or influencers), coordinated communities, links, images, videos and data feeds, and provide automated reports which generate automated insights for the analyst. Analysts can understand these systems using our Constellation's Dashboard through interactive visualization and human interpretable AI or through the integration of their data pipeline with Blackbird's contextual data enrichment to gain deeper understanding of their data and metadata enabling new insights into threats. Target Buyers: GOVERNMENT (National Security, Interior, Intelligence and OSINT/HUMINT teams + Innovation/AI think tanks) ENTERPRISE (CISO or CMO at a Fortune 500/Global 5000 Enterprise Organization)

Description: Brightcove is offers cloud-based platforms to publish and distribute digital media.
Full Description: Brightcove is offers cloud-based platforms to publish and distribute digital media. It offers Brightcove Video Cloud, an online video platform that enables its customers to publish and distribute video to internet-connected devices. The Brightcove Video Cloud platform offers various features and functionalities such as uploading and encoding, content management, video player technology, multi-platform video, live video streaming, distribution and syndication, social media, advertising and monetization, and analytics. The company also provides Zencoder, a cloud-based video encoding service with various features and functionalities, including file support, quality and control, platform and security, and account and integration; Brightcove Once, a cloud-based ad insertion and video stitching service, which addresses the limitations of traditional online video ad insertion technology; Brightcove Gallery, a cloud-based service that enables customers to create and publish video portals; Brightcove Perform, a cloud-based service for creating and managing video player experiences; and Brightcove Video Marketing Suite, a suite of video technologies designed to address the needs of marketers to drive awareness, engagement, and conversion. Brightcove was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.

Description: BrightPress is a provider of a simple licensing platform for several kinds of content creators- Photographers, Writers, Illustrators etc.
Full Description: BrightPress provides a subscription based per-click licensing platform for entities to license photographs, stories, images, MarkDown or raw JSON data. While originally focusing exclusively on licensing raw JSON data feeds, BrightPress has expanded its offerings to include stories, Markdown and Image support. Publishers of content can set their own pricing points for each subscriber and choose between a per month and per impression subscription plan. Dashboard analytics show publishers who is using their content and how much money they are earning from each subscriber. Publishers get paid twice monthly and get 70% of revenue generated by their works. Subscribers get debugging tools to integrate licensed content into their applications, dashboard analytics indicating where how much their subscription content is costing, powerful image manipulation support, and simple API access to their JSON-based subscriptions. Rather than setting up an API to host content, BrightPress offers a simple endpoint for serving, monitoring and monetizing a couple of content types (images, stories, Markdown and JSON).

Description: Cedexis is a software-defined application delivery platform.
Full Description: Founded in 2009 by Marty Kagan and Julien Coulon, two veterans of web hosting and content delivery market, Cedexis optimizes web performance across data centers, delivery networks and clouds for companies that want to reach new global markets.  With Cedexis, companies can comparatively assess worldwide cloud performance and availability for informed vendor selection and making cost-and-performance tradeoffs.  Cedexis also provides adaptive automation for dynamically optimizing traffic across clouds, data centers and delivery networks to dynamically match the best-performing clouds with local demand.  Since revenue conversions and brand experience are directly tied to online performance, media, retail and consumer branded companies rely on Cedexis to ensure 100% availability, fast page loads, downloads and transactions to drive traffic and revenue at lower cost and risk.   Cedexis is headquartered in Portland (OR) and Paris (EMEA) with offices in San Francisco (CA), London (UK) and sales representatives in Germany, Japan, Israel and Brazil.

Description: CellSpin provides a suite of social networking applications for online media.
Full Description: CellSpin has a suite of social networking applications for online media - featuring our new SOCIAL AD PLATFORM, plus our Mobile Blogging App and the Social Media Hub.  The new SOCIAL AD PLATFORM gives advertisers, ad networks and publishers the ability to seamlessly integrate real-time social media feeds inside any display ad unit. It converts the typical "static ad unit" into a "real-time multimedia enable interactive social unit." Most display ads today are limited to adding an image, an animated gif, or some Flash-based feature...but that has its limits...CellSpin's Social Ad Platform is HTML-based, which means you can now have a custom interactive ad with full multimedia capability within the display ad unit — giving advertisers the ability to capture Facebook fans, Twitter followers, YouTube subscribers and launch Skype calls. And since it's completely HTML5 compatible, it works on all tablets and smart phones, too.  The mobile app enables the instant sharing and publishing of all types of content to any website or social media platform from any device.  The Social Media Hub gives our customers the ability to embed a seamless social networking experience into their own websites — which enables them to make their website the center of their social graph — and successfully monetize their social network. The Social Media Hub enables online media companies to dramatically improve the way they interact online with their users — and significantly increase revenues.

Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Navigation and Mapping, Software, Video
Description: Centric App is a video discovery & sharing platform that matches video content from social platforms with local audiences.
Full Description: Centric App is a video discovery and sharing platform that matches video content from social platforms with local audiences. Problem: There is no user friendly, free, public facing platform that aggregates videos by location from social media. (e.g. YouTube, Twitter, Periscope). Centric App allows users to organically discover videos of what’s happening around them and see what’s going on outside the “echo chamber” - of their own networks. At the same time creators need a way to connect organically and share video content with audiences that does not involve infiltrating their social networks or gaming social platforms algorithms. The result is a dis-connect, with users missing out on what’s happening around them and creators producing huge amounts of content that is not reaching new viewers, growing audiences or monetizing. In reality it is gathering dust. Solution: Centric App allows anyone to quickly discover videos being published around them, whatever the channel or platform. They can find out what’s happening locally, discover new content, share and comment. They can follow, engage and connect with creators and publishers on the source platform. Bottom line is Centric matches video content by location, just like Tinder, bringing audiences and videos together. Centric shares undiscovered content with a new audience and grows reach for content producers. ￼

Description: Citizen is a free mobile application that notifies its users with safety alerts and real-time incident updates.
Full Description: Citizen is a free mobile application that notifies its users with safety alerts and real-time incident updates. It is a powerful force for good that has already evacuated people from burning buildings, diverted school buses from nearby terrorist attacks, and, in one instance, led to the rescue of a one-year-old boy from a stolen car.  It is a truly unique proposition that provides you with alerts from 911 data that until now has never been made available to the public. The alerts are accompanied by live stories, real-time updates, and user-generated content to provide you with the information you need so you know what’s happening around you rather than having to wonder why police are on your corner or there are helicopters above you. Today, over a million people across the United States have downloaded the app and use it to keep themselves, their families, and their friends safe.  Emergency services and community activists alike hail the app as a ground-breaking development in personal and community safety. Over 1 million New Yorkers have citizens, and the app has seen similar growth, usage, and engagement in LA, SF, Philadelphia, and Baltimore.  The company was founded in 2017 and based in New York City, New York.

Description: Class Photo Fund is an online platform to enable K-12 schools to raise funds by selling old class/team/club photos on Facebook.
Full Description: Class Photo Fund evolved from Peter & Michelle Nordberg’s desire to find alternative and more productive fundraising ideas for their kids’ NYC public school and its PTA. Recognizing the fun and appeal of old school photos on Facebook, the founders endeavored to create a fundraising platform to enable schools to utilize the legacy archival assets that sit dormant in the old yearbooks in school libraries and Principal offices. Class Photo Fund is owned by Donator Networks LLC. Similar in mandate to a Benefit Corporation (B-Corp), Donator Networks was established to create for-profit enterprises and business models that allocate cash proceeds, resources or revenue streams to segments of society not well organized to help themselves. Class Photo Fund is the first operation built and financed by Donator Networks and serves to demonstrate how progressive incentive structures combined with contemporary business models can benefit schools.

Description: Classic Stills is a bespoke publisher of rare and iconic photographs.
Full Description: We believe art is about much more than aesthetics. We're a team of art and photography lovers, we’re nostalgists and romantics, and we want to decorate our walls with artwork that does more than just look pretty or cool. Our rare and iconic images stir some of the strongest emotional connections we have from childhood through to present day: our favorite movies and TV shows, the bands we listen to, the teams we love and the brands we embrace. Our photographs come from the vaults of our partners. Most have never been released as limited-edition prints, or have only been affordable to fine art collectors. Our mission is to make these striking and evocative images accessible to the fans they resonate with, so they can own a piece of the culture they helped create. That’s why we created Classic Stills.

The Toolbarâ€:tm:s Project menu allows users to quickly switch between Projects. Their browsing history is automatically saved to the Project. Users can create Custom Lists to further organize their SmartMarks via drag & drop sorting. Projects can also be interconnected to create Semantic webs of knowledge. Cloud based Collaboration Project owners can add others (CoSearchers) to their Projects at anytime. These CoSearchers then see the Project in their Toolbar and on their Project List page. The Project owner can set CoSearchersâ€:tm: permission levels. With Full permission a CoSearcher can do anything the Projectâ€:tm:s owner can do. CoKnown automatically keeps track of who added what to the Project.  Notes & Writing Tools Noteboxes can be added anywhere within a Project. These Noteboxes are unlimited in length, have a full text editor and spell checking.  This allows users to write within the context of their SmartMarks. They can then assemble these chunks into a final format with Conclusion boxes.

Description: Criteek is a SaaS cloud video platform automating the sourcing, hosting, curating & streaming of user-generated video for ecommerce.
Full Description: CRITEEK EXECUTIVE SUMMARY  Criteek is the first video platform to give retailers and brands the ability to source, stream and share customer-generated video and video reviews. PROBLEM •	Online shopping does not provide customers a way to experience the product like they can at the store. •	Written content is not well suited for a mobile-first, social-sharing world. •	Retailers and brands want video because they know their shoppers want it (over 80% of all Internet traffic will be video by 2019 and because it sells more product). •	Retailers and brands don’t have enough video because producing, gathering or managing enough video to meet customer demand is logistically and financially impossible. SOLUTION •	Criteek enhances the shopping experience and engages shoppers with personalized customer-generated video directly on the product page, leading to increased sales. •	Criteek patent-pending technology streamlines the process of activating customers, then gathering, screening, hosting, managing and streaming their video to the product page and social networks, and sharing it among marketing partners, through an easily-managed online dashboard.  •	Clients get a sustainable, scaled pipeline of credible video from their customers and their partners for the cost of moderation. •	Criteek collects proprietary data with insights into the shopping experience, how shoppers consume video and how video can be used to increase sales. WHY NOW? Brands and retailers can no longer compete on price and product differentiation alone. Now, they are competing squarely on customer experience.  Video is the immediately scalable medium that transforms the customer experience.  Recognizing this, Amazon has begun to gather and stream video reviews from their customers.  However, their tech is proprietary. Criteek now provides brands and retailers with a way to remain competitive. TECHNOLOGY 	Tech is patent-pending. 	Tech is difficult to build. 	The platform creates value by:  -- helping clients increase shopper engagement and sales; -- providing an interdependent video content network among those clients; -- producing a proprietary data set around video & eCommerce. TEAM Scott Randall, CEO 	Founded BrandGames, the first company to leverage videogames as media 	Marketed to Fortune 500 companies, including Pizza Hut, GAP, TacoBell, & Pepsi 	Sold BrandGames in 2001 	Built the digital & ecommerce infrastructure for a $220mm children’s brand 	Marketing thought leader – presented at global conferences (Milken Global Conference) 	Award winning marketer - Marketing Technology Award, WebAwards, Art Direction’s Creativity Award, Davey Award, Communicator Award Rahul Khosla, CTO 	Founder - eDynamic: marketing tech agency 	ex-Accenture consultant and digital marketing executive 	Advised and consulted Fortune 500 firms on marketing technology 	Marketing automation expert Kyle Wilkinson, COO 	BI & marketing analytics at GILT & BTR 	Customer data modeling expert 	Derivatives modeler & trader 	Built & managed financial risk models COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE 	Criteek’s patent-pending technology has the ability to capture, moderate, stream & syndicate video across multiple domains. 	Criteek creates an eco-system of video content sharing: --video is easily acquired from customers, partners & social networks and creates a content-sharing network. 	Criteek creates platform dependency for users   --clients depend on video-sharing content pipeline. 	Criteek produces data & insight: --the Criteek platform gives us a proprietary view of the use, sharing & performance of video for use in increasing client sales.

Industries: Creative Agency, Mobile Apps, Web Development
Industry Groups: Apps, Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Software
Description: Crossfield is a digital agency that provides web and mobile software development, creative, and product strategy services.
Full Description: Crossfield is a digital agency that provides web and mobile software development, creative and product strategy services. THE BEGINNING Crossfield began as a mobile gaming start-up called PrePlay, which developed web and mobile applications that enabled sports fans to make predictions about every play of every game.   PrePlay was the #1 live sports prediction game from 2010-2015 and spanned across professional baseball, football, hockey and tennis.  Over that time, our users made over 50 million predictions across all of our applications. JOINING A NEW TEAM PrePlay was acquired by FanVision Entertainment (FVE) in September of 2014.  FVE added PrePlay’s management and software expertise to further deliver on its mission to enhance the spectator experience. THE TRANSITION FanVision Entertainment is one of a portfolio of companies within the Related Sports and Entertainment (RSE) Ventures family of companies.  When sister company Relevent Sports, the operators of the International Champions Cup, called us about developing their new website, the transition from mobile gaming experts to work-for-hire software development agency began. A NEW NAME After launching the International Champions Cup site and signing Bleacher Report as a partner for its March Madness Bracket Challenge Game, we set out to rebrand the agency to reflect our broader range of capabilities.   Prediction gaming (including live prediction, bracket and streak games) remains a core competency, but we built a team that has decades of combined creative, development and digital strategy experience that spans far beyond gaming.  PrePlay as a self-published product was shut down, and Crossfield Digital, the agency, was born in October of 2015.

Description: CultureMap is a local digital lifestyle brand leveraging technology to engage with more than 3 million users each month.
Full Description: Originally known as ViewMarket, CultureMap is a local digital lifestyle brand leveraging various technologies to engage with more than 2.5 million users each month. Co-founded by experienced entrepreneurs Alexander Muse and Robert Bennett, the company has raised approximately $1M in seed capital from prominent investors including 500 Startups and Silicon Valley Growth Syndicate (the last valuation was $7.5M pre-money).   Over the past two years the company has developed various web, mobile, video and iBeacon technology platforms to scale a digital lifestyle brand. To that end the company acquired two existing brands including CultureMap and RSVP for stock. By integrating our technology the company is now generating approximately $360K per month in revenue and operating on a breakeven basis. Presently the company has rolled out in Houston, Dallas and Austin (adding San Antonio and Fort Worth in Q4). Our footprint includes a local digital media presence as well as a targeted iBeacon deployment in retail through each market.  The company has begun raising a $5M Series A to expand its digital and iBeacon footprint into New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, San Francisco and Atlanta. Based on current projections the company expects to generate approximately $100M in annual revenue within 36 months following the expansion.

Industries: E-Learning, News
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Education, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Curiosity Shots is an innovative news and eLearning forum that uses digital and dopaminergic tools to help spark a passion for learning.
Full Description: News Designed To Mend And Inform   Curiosity Shots provides an innovative news forum designed to generate meaningful dialogue across all areas of public life. Learning happens best when there is robust dialogue among diverse groups with differing backgrounds and opinions. Rather than being another outlet focused on ‘Breaking News,’ dramatization, and sensationalism, Curiosity Shots intends on bridging cultural divides by fostering communication. Our writers include the likes of students, members of the working public, elite journalists, celebrities, and artists. We are fostering a community that includes people from all walks of life in order to inform and mend wounds. Until all voices are heard, not just media, financial, and political elites, only division will persist. This is why our team leaves out no group and involves all people in the conversation under one roof.   Educational Content Created To Inspire   In an age defined by our ability to interact with the entire known cosmos with a mere touch of a tablet, all citizens have become perpetual students. It is for this reason that Curiosity Shots believes the time has arrived to introduce a reinvigorated model of education. One that not only meets the demands of our time, but pioneers advancements in integrating technology into the learning process. The assembly line model of education that persists to this day was designed to produce factory workers for an export-oriented economy. This is why students are force-fed information via a one-size-fits-all approach without consideration for individual differences and what it means to truly learn. Curiosity Shots offers an alternative with new, stimulating, video-based educational content designed to create lifelong learners.

Description: The Daily Press Media Group gathers, packages, and distributes news, information, and advertising in the Virginia Peninsula.
Full Description: The Daily Press Media Group is a diversified company that gathers, packages, and distributes news, information, and advertising in the Virginia Peninsula located in the Hampton Roads region of southeastern Virginia, and in surrounding communities. The company publishes the Daily Press newspaper seven days a week, the twice-weekly Virginia Gazette in Williamsburg, the weekly Tidewater Review serving the greater West Point area, and more. The Daily Press Media Group also distributes news, advertising, and other information through various multimedia channels, including its online affiliates: dailypress.com, hrtownsquare.com, hrvarsity.com, hrmilitary.com and more; radio, television, and mobile; direct mail, event marketing, and promotions; and social media. It is the local affiliate of several national classified websites, including CareerBuilder.com, Cars.com and Homefinder.com. Readers can obtain a Daily Press digitalPLUS subscription and receive access to local news, investigative reporting, in-depth local sports coverage, local entertainment, premium content, the Digital Edition, and more. The Daily Press Media Group was established in 1896 and is headquartered in Virginia, United States. The company operates as a subsidiary of Tribune Publishing, an American newspaper and print media publishing company.

Description: Daily Steak was born out of the frustration in the way we consume video and audio news.
Full Description: Daily Steak was born out of the frustration in the way we consume video and audio news.  The problem:  When you listen or watch the news you want to be able to skip over uninteresting or unimportant stories. When a "good story" comes on want to be able to get the full story and editorials.  The solution:  Audio and video summaries of the days news. Use voice, touch, or air gestures to get the full story and editorials. giving you the ability to get the days news in a few minutes or compare perspectives (Fox vs. Al Jazeera on the same story).  Our mission is to "Get you to the news you want, fast". By fix the "relevance gap" that exists in the video, audio news market and that has persisted for decades.

Description: DailyCaption takes Flickr photos out of context through caption contests. Building on the success of sites like
Full Description: DailyCaption takes Flickr photos out of context through caption contests.  Building on the success of sites like http://icanhascheezburger.com, where people can add humorous captions to photos, DailyCaption users can submit captions to the featured generated Flickr photo of the day and vote up captions that they think are clever, funny, or just plain odd.  At the end of the day, the caption that got the most votes wins and is recorded for bragging rights and posterity.  As of June 16, 2008 DailyCaption was fully integrated into the Facebook Platform as a Facebook Application.

Description: Documoto is a Denver-based software company that simplifies the selling, managing, and supporting of machine and equipment parts.
Full Description: Documoto is a Denver-based software company that simplifies the selling, managing, and supporting of machine and equipment parts. Documoto’s vision is to provide innovative software solutions for equipment manufacturers, their network, and their equipment owners to keep the world’s machines working. Their solutions help these businesses rise to the unique challenges found in the complex equipment aftermarket – improve the accuracy, lower the costs, and decrease the lead time for essential technical documentation; fend off gray-market and will fitter competition for increased market share; maximize equipment uptime; provide a top-notch experience for their internal team, channel, and customers; and streamline MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul) operations. Through our solutions, suppliers, manufacturers, channels, and equipment owners get closer to each other, optimizing costs and increasing revenues through a unified “content supply chain”. Documoto's flagship product, is an enterprise cloud-based solution for authoring parts catalogs and related content, securely distributing that content over the web to any device in a variety of translations, and ordering the right parts and products the first time, every time. Founded in 2010, Documoto is headquartered in Englewood, Colorado, with sales offices in Europe and resellers across the globe.

Description: Dusk is an app that lets users live stream anonymously to its online community, while protecting their identity.
Full Description: Dusk is created  to allow people to safely discuss topics, confessions, and news and share real thoughts, and help find real solutions to hard problems that face our world today and tomorrow.  Remember the point of protecting your identity is not to say mean things and hide, it is designed to give users the strength to speak up, and express your honest self and create real, open and healthy dialogs people can discuss without being social convicted, and attached to what others might find offensive or not aligned with popular agendas. Your safety is our concern at all times, we have done some things to keep you safe when you use Dusk * We pixelate your video in real time, no version of your video un-pixelated ever exists (technically impossible)  * We mask your voice pitch, you can tweak this in the setting too * You can mute people who you find abusive, they will never know they have been muted * You can report people who are spamming you or being abusive  * Pin verification upon app entry, even when multitasking between apps * We never ask for any private information such as location, email address, mobile number, or anything else that hackers could steal from us. * we use end-to-end encryption even though none of your data is on the app.

Description: Launched in 2010, the site offers families a free trial of the pay version of its website for 30 days. Families share content privately.
Full Description: While honeymooning in 2005, my wife and I came up with the idea for eFamily.com. We knew we wanted to start our own family and share those special moments with those closest to us, many of whom happened to be thousands of miles away. Also during that time, we were selling the first consumer web-based business that I co-founded (3GUpload.com), so it was the perfect moment to combine our love of family and business. Fast-forwarding to 2010 (after a few attempts to build our own solution), we had an opportunity to expand the eFamily service with the acquisition of Famiva.com. At that point, we were able to realize our original vision of family sites with photos, videos, status updates, shared calendar, family tree, and custom family domains. Our company grew, but – like nearly every online business – we started seeing strong demand for mobile versions of our service. And so in 2013, we decided to purchase the software assets from a company called Origami. We loved Origami’s software solution including the mobile applications – arguably the best in the marketplace. Our plan with the Origami software acquisition is to create an even more powerful eFamily service. We’ll take the lessons we’ve learned from our experience in the family space, and we’ll apply those to this powerful new platform moving forward. So in closing, a lot of people wonder why we’ve been diligently pursuing this business for over 8 years. It may seem illogical to most, but there is a deeper reason and motivation than just business success and financial rewards. We truly believe a site like eFamily.com can change the world for the better. When we look back on our lives, we will be able to say that we helped families stay connected and celebrate life – no matter the distance.  eFamily.com believe that at the root of positive change in society is a group of healthy families, and part of staying healthy as a family is communication and celebrating life. As a result of our efforts, we hope to help this world become a better place. Will you join us?

Description: EFI provides business process automation solutions, color digital front ends, and digital inkjet printers.
Full Description: EFI provides business process automation solutions, color digital front ends, and digital inkjet printers. It operates in three segments. Its industrial inkjet segment provides VUTEk super-wide format UV, LED, textile dye sublimation, and thermoforming industrial digital inkjet printers and ink for use in commercial photo labs, sign shops, graphic screen printers, specialty commercial printers, and digital and billboard graphics providers. It also provides hybrid and flatbed UV wide format graphics printers to theindustrial digital inkjet printer market along with Jetrion label and packaging digital inkjet printing systems, integration solutions, and specialty inks to the converting, packaging, and direct mail industries. In addition, it also provides cretaprint ceramic tile decoration digital inkjet printers. EFI operates a productivity software segment that provides business process software known as Monarch and Metrics. It also provides Pace, a cloud-based business process automation software; Radius, a business process automation software for label and packaging printers; Digital StoreFront, a cloud-based e-commerce solution that enables print service providers to provide integrated printing solutions over the internet. Its fiery segment provides stand-alone DFEs connected to digital printers, copiers, and other peripheral devices. It also provides PrintMe, mobile printing application; optional software integrated into its DFEs, such as Fiery Central, Command WorkStation, and MicroPress; and stand-alone software-based solutions, such as proofing and scanning solutions, along with other products. EFI was established in 1988, headquartered in Fremont, California.

Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Transportation, Video
Description: EIDR is the universal unique identifier for movie and television assets. A not-for-profit, open standard, membership organization.
Full Description: Founded in 2010 by MovieLabs at the request of the six major Hollywood studios (Disney, Sony, Paramount, Warner Bros., Fox, NBCUniversal) EIDR is a non-profit industry consortium that develops and manages an API-accessible registry of global ID numbers for all movie and TV content. Based on ISO's DOI (Digital Object Identifier) standard, EIDR is analogous to ISBN #'s for books and UPC codes for CPG - creating a unique serial number for content ID, delivery, measurement and reporting. In addition to the major studios, EIDR's international membership includes Google, Netflix, Comcast, Amazon, Microsoft, ITV, Canal+ and many more. Responsibilities include association and financial management, fundraising and member recruitment, service planning and development, and driving use case adoption and deployment. Now at more than 1.8 million unique content records, EIDR is a foundational driver of metadata supply-chain automation in the media and entertainment industry.

Description: Archive, Share Kid's Lives
Full Description: eKidfolio is a website created for the purpose of documenting, sharing, and archiving the lives of our children through the use of a closed social network to create a digital life portfolio. eKidfolio.com is a suite of web-based software applications that support the archival, categorization, sorting, retrieval, and social sharing of our children’s life portfolio. The suite will support the needs of families by offering:  the ability to upload and store (in the cloud) all digital media and all analog artifacts converted to digital media through the process of scanning and digital photography/videography,   categorization and customization of categories and profiles for diverse needs and capabilities of parents and guardians to tag, label and comment on all artifacts  the ability to create a completely customizable social network (called “the family tree”) for the purposes of: sharing artifacts to deliberately selected members in your social network  the integration of existing powerful social networks including facebook, and twitter ultimately, the integration of  a smartphone app (droid and iphone) to allow for the      immediate uploading of archivable material. Sharing By using the family tree function of eKidfolio you can create and customize your own personal social network for the purpose of sharing the triumphs of your children with family and loved ones of your choosing. Specific permissions are customized for each member of your family tree (closed social network). Aunt Helen might be able to just view, while Grandma might be able to view, post and tag. You choose! In addition to social sharing and archiving life events, eKidfolio creates a secure place to store important documents such as: birth records medical and immunization records school report cards enrollment information  parent teacher communications  special education records In the event of a disaster in the home, your priceless memories are protected. eKidfolio uses cutting edge technology for the purpose of fast, and easy uploading of multiple documents.

Description: Elemental Technologies is the leading supplier of software-defined video solutions for multiscreen content delivery.
Full Description: Elemental Technologies is the leading supplier of software-defined video solutions for multiscreen content delivery. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Portland, Oregon, the company pioneered the use of software-based video processing to distribute and monetize video over IP networks. Description: Empowered Presentations is a digital company that uses software to create unique visual experiences.
Full Description: Empowering and saving lives through presentations! We take an average Powerpoint / Keynote presentation from existing or from scratch and make it a masterpiece, award winner, standing ovation presentation! Description *Award Winning Design We know how important that next presentation is to you. It could change everything for your business, your career, your life, if you could just deliver it correctly. Let us help you in creating an Empowered Presentation that will win over your audience and not put them to sleep. *Spot On Consulting If you have some questions? We have the answers! Discussing where you are now, where you want to go, and what is needed to get you there! For a consultation click here. *One-on-one Presentation Coaching Everyone successful has a coach, even Steve Jobs. Public speaking tops the list of the number one fear. We can assist you in delivering your presentation slide by slide prior to the big day to flush out all the bugs and help you to be the best you can. For a One-on-One Presentation Coaching click here. *Empowered Presentations Presents! Are you tired of the boring keynote addresses that fail to launch your event and leave your audience wanting their money back? Do you have an audience that deserves to be inspired by a dynamic presentation that will engage, inform, and entertain? Well we can do that for you! That’s what we do! To book an Empowered Presentation speaking engagement click here. *Design & Delivery Workshops Hosted locally in Honolulu, EP has 4 different workshops we provide that focuses on Presentation Basics, Do’s and Don’ts, Storyboarding, and Creating an Award Winning Presentation. They may sound simple, but they are highly in depth and will introduce many elements that are not the norm, and will create a paradigm shift in the way you create presentations forever. Register Today! *Visually Empowered Webinars For those who are not locally in Honolulu, we provide monthly webinars based on the 4 workshops we deliver in a more condensed version that will highlight key points without going into the nitty gritty. *Empowered R&R Retreats Held locally here in Honolulu, Hawaii. For our MVP clients that know their presentations are of great importance to them, their company, and their careers. We will fly you in to our offices for a 4 day overhaul of your presentation from beginning to end delivery. If you choose to stay longer (why not), we will build in a few days of R&R while you build your presentation with us. General Information YOUR PRESENTATION DESERVES IT! Empowered Presentations is a design and consulting company. You will receive a customized, one-of-a-kind, high-impact presentation designed to target your specific audiences. In a nut shell, you will have a presentation that will knock your viewers socks off! DISCUSS. First things first. A basic understanding of the W’s. Who is your audience, What is the purpose, Where will you present this, When do you want it completed, Why do you desire our help. Lay it all on the table.  DESIGN. After discussing your needs, a story board is created for your presentation. A perfect flow and deliver an impacting story with stunning visuals. The finished deck will be professional, precise, and perfected for delivery.  DELIVER. One presentation can have a huge impact or no impact if the message is not conveyed precisely, effectively and authentically. You will be coached and practice on how to effectively deliver your new phenomenal presentation.  CREATIVITY IS A PROCESS. Most presenters do not spend more than a couple hours creating their presentation. Thus resulting in a non-impacting, boring, dull presentation. Taking your concepts and context and reworking them in to a visual story takes time. You know how much time you have until you must deliver your presentation and we will work together to get your story together as fast and efficiently as possible.  THE BOTTOM LINE. Every presentation is different. Some presentations need fine tuning and some need a complete overhaul. Pricing options will be discussed in the consulting phase of the project. There is no project too big or too small for EP. Every project that is undertaken gets completed! CLEAN. CRISP. CONCISE. Empowered Presentations focuses on elimination. Eliminating all distraction and leaving only what is necessary on each and every slide. Creating slides that are easily understood the second you see it. Keeping it open and free of cluttered templates. Introducing clear, crisp visuals to impact the audience. Being concise with context and deliver with purpose and passion. DISTRIBUTION METHODS. No matter your preference, Empowered Presentations is prepared with the latest software to provide you with any file format you desire. PowerPoint, Keynote, Adobe PDF, and Graphic Files. Additional special delivery methods may include, Slideshare, Facebook, YouTube, Slideworld, and on our weblog EmpoweredPresentations.com for combined massive exposure. I'M READY! Contact us immediately! The time is now to begin the creative process that will take your existing or ground up presentation to new heights and make you stand out from the rest.  You deserve the best because your message is desired to be heard by millions of people! Let’s begin!

Industries: Content, GPU, Hardware, Software, Video, Video Streaming
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Hardware, Media and Entertainment, Software, Video
Description: Equiso Smart TV - Make your dumb tv... smart.
Full Description: Equiso Smart TV - Make your dumb tv... smart. Turn any TV into a Smart TV. Android 4.0. Control it with the wave of a hand, using their revolutionary gesture remote.  Equiso puts the Power of an Android tablet on your TV.  Combined with their interactive remote, Equiso will truly refine your TV experience. Watch stunning 1080p HD content from Netflix, Hulu Plus, YouTube and many more! Send emails, update your facebook status, play Angry Birds or Fruit Ninja like never before. Download new apps, create and display a powerpoint, listen to music, read books, and play most all those interactive games you love so much on your phone or tablet. Imagine showing up to do a presentation, and all you had to do, was plug it in, grab your remote, and you're ready to go. Game night with your buddies is now easier than ever.  Bring your device with you in your pocket, plug in and play. Their 1.4 HDMI 1080p port allows for direct plugin to any TV, Monitor, or Projector. This enables any of these devices to instantly become a Smart TV and eliminates the need for extra cables.  A Remote like no other This remote is like nothing you have ever experienced before. Advanced accelerometers and gyros sense your gestures, turning them into life like interaction with your Smart TV. Soft touch buttons on top add to your Smart TV experience. Simply flip the remote over and it becomes a full keyboard, no pain staking tasks of typing letter by letter on the screen. Flip it back over and your gesture remote is back in full action to conquer that next level of Angry Birds or Tower Defense. Don't worry about accidentally pressing the buttons on the keyboard. Their gyros sense the remotes position and turn off the keyboard as you glide your way around. This is truly the next step into a Smart TV. Under the Hood They wanted to created a device that was affordable for everyone without sacrificing performance. Equiso is equipped with a new, powerful, redesigned 1Ghz Arm Cortex A5 Processor. Using the lastest technology in memory it features 512MB of DDR3 memory that compliments the performance of the system. Graphics was very important as they wanted to include 3D gaming. To achieve this they installed a Mali 400 graphics processor. High Definition Streaming of movies, gaming, and music was a must, so they added a Wireless N radio that is capable of speeds up 250 megabits, to ensure blazing fast downloads. Their 1.4 HDMI plug n play interface allows for direct plugin to any TV, Monitor, or Projector and supports 3D Video. Included is 8GB of internal storage for storing music, movies, documents, games and more. They put a USB port on the back for a keyboard, a mouse, external hard drives and anything else you can plug in. Heat was a major concern for a form factor this small. For this reason they chose the most energy efficient Arm CPU per watt. They worked tirelessly on a case that would disperse the heat but handle the dust. Equiso is very quiet as there are no moving parts. They truly hope your enjoy their product.

Description: ExtremePhoto is an iPhone application that enables its users to edit, enhance, and share photos.
Full Description: ExtremePhoto, a new iTunes application that promises to make your pictures so extreme they might blow up your phone, is now available in the App Store.  The application is free to download, with in-app purchases for .99c and uses explosions, body builders, sharks, flaming vans, tanks, and more explosions to rid your Instagram of over-filtered sunsets and fruit arrangements.  ExtremePhoto is social by nature, and features one-touch sharing to your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and email, so tell your grandmother sorry but she will no longer be “liking” your social media photos. “The idea for ExtremePhoto, like many great things, came on a bus to Mammoth after a few beers.  My friends (now cofounders) and I were frightened for the future of social media what with so many photos of kale smoothies and the sky clogging our feeds.  We wanted to create something to reverse this trend, and would allow people to stare down explosions, wear American flag bandanas, sport moustaches like Burt Reynolds, and wrestle with giant imposing men at the touch of a button” CEO Drew Ligget says.

Description: Eye Phone is to help the user better see, read, and type on their phone or tablet.
Full Description: Eye Phone App... How Does it Work? As currently designed in the technical drawings and 3-D models, the app has unique features not presently available in the marketplace.  Although the programming has not yet been developed and is still in the developmental stages, an explanation of possible operation is as follows: The primary function of Eye Phone is to help the user better see, read, and type on their phone or tablet. The user will be able to adjust the phone or tablet screen to their eyesight. Since the user will not always be the same distance from their phone or tablet, the user can have several different focus settings saved to the app. This will allow the user to quickly and easily adjust the screen for their eyes. The user will have the option to focus the screen three different ways, by prescription strength, an eye chart or manually adjusting the screen. What Problem(s) Does it Solve? The unique features of this app will provide the following benefits for all consumers: • Allows the user to adjust the phone or tablet screen to their eyesight • Saves the user time and energy by not having to squint to read their phone or tablet • Gives the user 3 different options to adjust the screen Mr. O’ Connor envisions his product appealing to multitudes of consumers worldwide who use     their “smart phones” not only for communication but also for innovative solutions. The markets are extensive for an ingenious app like Eye Phone; Google Play and iTunes are the most popular app stores in the primary market and are the ideal places to market this app. However, for the Android version of the app there are several new stores popping all over the cyber world such as, AppsLib, Samsung Apps, F-Droid, Slide ME, GetJar, and Amazon App Store for Android. Mr. O’ Connor wishes to leave the market open for subsequent variances and possibilities that could improve the feasibility and marketability of his product.

Description: EZDRM is a leading provider of Hosted Digital Rights Management (DRM) Solutions.
Full Description: EZDRM is a leading provider of Hosted Digital Rights Management (DRM) Solutions. They have evolved with the DRM technology, starting out in 2000 with Windows Media DRM. Today's offerings include Apple's FairPlay Streaming, Microsoft's PlayReady, Google's Widevine and their own DASH Multi-DRM Solution - Universal DRM, a combination of Modular Widevine and PlayReady via Common Encryption (CENC) over DASH. This service, along with FairPlay Streaming, fulfills all your DRM requirements.  Along with their vast network of partners, they make it easy for thier customers to deliver an efficient, cost-effective and superior method of content protection and control.
